item.description:
Apologies for all the adjustments to time and date. We've been trying to plan a night and time that works for our group and the restaurant.



This place has excellent seafood--I've been lucky enough to eat there a couple of times before. Although priced on the higher end compared to some other menus we've perused, this will not be a disappointing meal!

Should there be enough interest, EDEMG member Jen will try to use her connections with the owner to secure us the back room, so RSVP early!

Here is their website: http://www.medizarest...

and a short review: http://www.gayot.com/....

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: A Taste of the Mediterranean--Mediza in West Hartford
